name: xmasgiftsblocks
description:
Motivation

XmasGiftsBlocks is based on 4cubes, updated for  "chrismas jam 2018"

Description

It is a puzzle game where you have to put 4 blocks in a row, vertically and horizontally.  For passing to the next level you have to destroy all  blocks represented by gifts.

Story

In the factory of dreams  a machine has gone mad and now is mixin' all the christmas presents.

Meanwhile it's not getting repaired you must clean all the mess up,  for ensuring that the right packets arrive to the good girls and boys.

It's up to you !!

Enjoy it.
